channel.title: CVE Feed for golang -- archiver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for golang -- archiver

item.title: CVE-2018-1002207|2024-08-05T12:47:57.556Z -- golang -- archiver
item.description: mholt/archiver golang package before e4ef56d48eb029648b0e895bb0b6a393ef0829c3 is vulnerable to directory traversal, allowing attackers to write to arbitrary files via a ../ (dot dot slash) in an archive entry that is mishandled during extraction. This vulnerability is also known as 'Zip-Slip'.
